Articles.Content:
Like many others, I was riding the hypetrain to 1.0, but I made a dreadful mistake along the tracks. I deleted my KSP 0.9 right before release of 1.0, and am unable to get it back. I figured out quite quickly that I simply do not like playing without my favourite mods. I have come to the conclusion that Stock KSP is a canvas, but it's the paint that makes it a work of art.

Long story short, I was wondering if there was a legit way to acquire older versions of KSP, IE KSP 0.9

Thank you in advance.

Steam:

 Right click KSP - Beta programs - (should be) Select 0.90

Store:

 Go to download page - download 0.90
KSP 0.9 is still available on the download page of the official website.
You guys are amazing, thank you so much

> 
> Like many others, I was riding the hypetrain to 1.0, but I made a dreadful mistake along the tracks. I deleted my KSP 0.9 right before release of 1.0, and am unable to get it back.

I learned the hard way a long time ago. I \*never\* delete old versions. when either Minecraft or KSP has a new update, the old version is saved in an archive directory and occasionally backed up on DVD. I've got every version of both games that I've ever had, Minecraft back to Beta 1.3\_01 and KSP back to 0.16
